quest.wel.wel.title: Welcome
quest.wel.quest.title: Quest
quest.wel.quest.main1: The diamond symbol in the task marks the beginning of a chapter, and the square represents the end of a chapter.
quest.wel.quest.main2: In a chapter's task, there may be multiple starting and ending points.
quest.wel.blueprint.main: The modpack contains some structural blueprints, welcome to use

quest.wel.writer.main: The writer is Xiao_senfang. You can content me in mcmod.cn @枫桦灰桥 or bilibili @森林防护
